summary: Functional test suite that validates Conan's GNU Autotools toolchain integration, covering configuration, build, option handling, dependency resolution and platform‑specific behaviors such as Windows subsystems, Cygwin, MinGW/MSYS and MSVC flag handling.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable packaging and building of C/C++ projects with Autotools through Conan by automatically testing core features, command‑line overrides, dependency detection and cross‑platform compatibility.
